duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide psychosocial assessments and a full range of psychosocial interventions for patients and their families.
Assist with complex discharge planning and bereavement counseling.
Collaborate within interprofessional teams to serve patients and the larger community from both a micro and macro level.
Offer coverage of other inpatient oncology social workers and support the inpatient benign gyn service and gynecological cancer population.

education_certification.credential: Master's degree in Social Work, Psychology, or a related field (LCSW licensure preferred)
